title: Spicy beans on toast with tomato and basil garnish
steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the onion and chilli flakes for 1-2 minutes, or until softened, then add the vegetarian bacon. Fry for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown and crisp.
Add the tomatoes and baked beans and cook for 2-3 minutes to warm through.
Serve the beans and bacon on a slice of toast, with slices of tomato and cheddar on top, garnished with fresh basil.
